response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $1,350,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fair market valuation and an attractive offer for you. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the product's true worth to you is $1,500,000. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1350000}
